name: Tamagotchi Pet
description: Virtual pet widget that displays Lottie animations, videos, or sprite sheets. Reacts to mood changes from connected moodlet widgets to show different emotional states.
author: StickerNest

setMood.description: Set pet mood from moodlet widget {mood: string, intensity: number, moodlets: object}

triggerAnimation.description: Trigger a specific animation (idle, happy, sad, hungry, tired, sick, celebrating, eating, drinking, sleeping, exercising)

setLottie.description: Load Lottie animation data {url?: string, data?: object, animationMap?: object}

setVideo.description: Load video source {url: string, videoMap?: object}

setSprite.description: Load sprite sheet {imageUrl: string, config: object, animations: object}

interact.description: Interact with pet (pet, feed, play, sleep)

taskCompleted.description: Notify pet that a task was completed {category: string, task: string}

petStatus.description: Current pet status {mood, happiness, energy, hunger}

petInteraction.description: Emitted when user interacts with pet

requestMoodSync.description: Request mood data from moodlet widget
